scripts.precommit: npm run generate && git add README.md
scripts.update-readme: echo 'Updating the readme…'; cson2json tips.cson | doxie --render --inject into README.md && echo '…done!'
scripts.update-toc: echo 'Updating the table of contents…'; cson2json tips.cson | doxie --render .doxie.render.toc.js --inject into README.md as toc && echo '…done!'
scripts.generate: npm run update-readme; npm run update-toc
